biotools.summary: This web-server is a web server that could predict ubiquitination sites in proteins. With the assistance of SVM, the highlight is to employ amino acid sequence features extracted from the sequence evolution information via grey system model (Grey-PSSM).

bioschemas.name: iUbiq-Lys
